pageContext.claim: “I got to know him very well. We have a good relationship. People said he has a good relationship with Kim Jong-Un and that's terrible. I said, no, that's good, but do you remember? It was going to be nuclear war and I got along with him. Then they said, Trump, made a terrible deal. He's given so much to North Korea. What did I give?”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence to support this claim. Trump exaggerates the possibility of war, which had been heightened by his own harsh rhetoric.
